attributes.action: Prevent Shamima Begum from being permitted to return to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Shamima Begum has given an interview to The Times journalist Anthony Lloyd and said that it was: "exactly what she expected and normal life" and that "she didn't regret her decision". 

She shows no remorse and is a clear risk to the security of law-abiding citizens of the UK. She should not be permitted the opportunity to spread the hatred of Daesh / IS on these shores and to have the opportunity to indoctrinate others.
attributes.background: Shamima Begum, and two other girls from East London, left the safety of the United Kingdom, to actively and intentionally join the caliphate of Daesh (a.k.a Islamic State), to become a Jihadi bride and supporter of this barbaric terrorist group.
